caption.p: Recombination pattern (according to jpHMM) of the 7 HIV-1 URFA/B isolated in Krasnoyarsk Krai and close HIV-1 CRF03_AB prototype from GenBank (03_AB_RU_97_KAL153_2). The scheme of recombination is presented for 6 HIV-1 since there were no differences detected for them in the studied gag-pol region (Krasnoyarsk 12.2, 21.2, 48, 100, 131, and 132).
